DialogueOption.Text: Well.. I'm here now, and I'm a traveler!

Dialogue.Page: Hah, I guess that's true. Welcome to the space program, hatchling!
By the way: Slate radioed me to boast about some feature they added to the new ships to help keep track of places they've been to before.
Apparently you can mark anywhere you've visited before on your map from the ship log? It was a lot of big words like that.
But uh, if you ever feel like it.. <Pause> Feel free to use that new feature to mark the Lunar Outpost and drop by for a mug of lunar sap wine anytime!
No pressure. Just have a few crates I've been saving to share with a friend. The longer you save them, the better they taste. <Pause> And they probably taste really good now.
I'd share some with you right now, but uh, we should probably do it another time.
When you're getting your space legs under you, it's a really bad idea to add lunar wine on top of that equation.
